footer.hipaa:
HIPAA Privacy Statement

Your Privacy Matters: At Grace Haven Medical Cellular Detox & Weight Loss, LLC, we prioritize the protection of your health information and are dedicated to maintaining your privacy in full compliance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). This notice outlines how we handle your Protected Health Information (PHI), your rights regarding this data, and our legal obligations.

Receiving PHI: Please note that communications from our website, including emails or electronic transmissions, may contain PHI. PHI refers to any health information that can identify you and is related to your medical condition, treatment, or payment for healthcare services.

Prohibited Activities: If you are not the intended recipient of an email or communication containing PHI, any unauthorized reviewing, copying, disseminating, printing, or distributing of this information is strictly prohibited.

Accidental Disclosure: If you believe you have received an email or communication containing PHI in error, please notify us immediately by replying to the email or contacting us atPrivacy@GraceHavenMedical.com. Please promptly delete the email or message without sharing it with others.

How We May Use and Disclose Your Health Information: Grace Haven Medical Cellular Detox & Weight Loss, LLC may use and disclose your PHI for specific purposes, including:

  • Treatment coordination, such as facilitating care with other healthcare providers if you require hospitalization.
  • To protect your safety and the safety of others if we believe you are a potential threat to yourself or others.

Your Rights Regarding Your Health Information: As a client of Grace Haven Medical Cellular Detox & Weight Loss, LLC, you have the right to:

  • Inspect, copy, or request corrections to your PHI.
  • Request restrictions on certain uses or disclosures of your PHI.
  • Request an accounting of disclosures we have made of your PHI
  • Lodge a complaint if you feel your privacy rights have been violated. You may contact us directly or file a complaint with the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. Grace Haven will not retaliate against you for filing a complaint.

Our Legal Duties Regarding Your Health Information: As required by law, Grace Haven Medical Cellular Detox & Weight Loss, LLC is committed to:

  • Maintaining the privacy of your PHI.
  • Adhering to the HIPAA Privacy Rule for the use and disclosure of PHI.
  • Implementing security measures in compliance with the HIPAA Security Rule to protect your electronic PHI (ePHI).
  • Complying with the HIPAA Breach Notification Rule, which mandates that we inform you in the event of a breach involving your PHI.

Privacy and Security Oversight: Our designated Privacy Officer, Tracy Crain, and Security Officer, Dr. Sean Arora, are responsible for ensuring our compliance with HIPAA regulations and the protection of your health information. You can reach them atPrivacy@GraceHavenMedical.com

Training and Awareness: Our staff undergoes regular HIPAA training to stay informed about privacy, security, and breach notification requirements. We are committed to upholding a culture of compliance and respect for your privacy rights.

Reporting Violations or Breaches: If you believe your privacy has been compromised or have concerns about the security of your health information, please contact us atPrivacy@GraceHavenMedical.com. We will promptly investigate and, if necessary, take corrective action.

Further Information: For more information about our privacy practices or to address specific questions, please contact us at .Privacy@GraceHavenMedical.com. We are committed to ensuring the confidentiality of your health information and addressing any concerns you may have.

questions.header: Is phentermine effective in promoting weight loss?
questions.body: Indeed, Phentermine has received FDA approval as a weight loss aid, indicating it has undergone rigorous clinical trials to prove its safety and efficacy for weight reduction. Its effectiveness is significantly enhanced when paired with consistent exercise and a reduced-calorie diet.

questions.header: How much weight will you lose while taking phentermine?
questions.body:
The amount of weight loss you experience with phentermine significantly hinges on two key factors: the amount of excess weight you carry and your ability to modify your eating and exercise patterns during its use.

Phentermine activates the sympathetic nervous system, known as a "sympathomimetic" or stimulant medication, enhancing bodily functions. By reducing appetite, it aids in calorie intake reduction, creating an energy deficit for weight loss.

faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our IV Therapy services.

questions.body: IV Therapy is a medical treatment that delivers fluids, vitamins, and minerals directly into the bloodstream through an intravenous line. It can help boost hydration, improve nutrient absorption, and support overall health and wellness.

questions.header: What is included in a "Myers Cocktail?"
questions.body: One of the earliest types of IV Vitamin therapy developed was by the late Dr. Myers; he came up with the Myers' Cocktail comprising magnesium, calcium, vitamin C, and other B-complex vitamins. As a matter of fact, the Myers' Cocktail played a major role in popularization and generalized adoption of IV Vitamin therapy by individuals all over. Since the Myer's Cocktail's original development, many other combinations of IV Vitamin therapy have been developed. The Myers' cocktail is a formula for IV vitamin therapy that contains: B vitamins, including B12, B6, and dexpanthenol Vitamin C Magnesium Calcium Zinc Glutathione Saline solution Vitamin B complex – Several vitamins make up the B complex group of vitamins. Some of these vitamins are Vitamin B1 (Thiamine), Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), Vitamin B5 (Dexpanthenol), and Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6). These vitamins play essential functions in the processes that place in the human body. Vitamin B12 – This is also known as cyanocobalamin. It serves many purposes in the human body; however, its primary function is in the production of red blood cells. A deficiency of this vitamin may result in a condition known as macrocytic megaloblastic anemia. Vitamin C – Studies have been performed that indicate several of the benefits of intravenous vitamin C. In the critically ill, vitamin C administered intravenously may help in the management of sepsis; it may also be of use in managing certain kinds of cancer. For individuals in good health, intravenous vitamins may serve to boost immunity and increase energy levels. Magnesium- Magnesium IV infusion can benefit your health in many ways. faq.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about the Cruchi Skincare product, including usage instructions and concerns.

questions.body: To use the Cruchi Skincare product, apply a small amount to clean, dry skin and gently massage in circular motions. Use twice daily for best results.

questions.header: Is it suitable for all skin types?
questions.body: Yes, the Cruchi Skincare product is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. However, if you have any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with a dermatologist before use.
The Cruchi Skincare product is formulated with ingredients that can help reduce the appearance of wrinkles over time. Consistent use is key for optimal results.
Yes, the Cruchi Skincare product is cruelty-free. We are committed to producing products that are not tested on animals.
The duration of the Cruchi Skincare product depends on individual usage. On average, a bottle can last approximately 2-3 months with regular use.

This cutting-edge, non-surgical treatment begins with a personalized consultation to assess your suitability for hair regrowth, followed by PRP microneedling and injections using your own Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP), enhanced with high-grade numbing cream for a comfortable, spa-like experience. Along with three combination therapy sessions, the package includes a tailored daily regimen and a three-month supply of topical serums and supplements to support continuous hair growth. Ideal for individuals experiencing thinning hair or early stages of hair loss, this therapy offers a natural, effective solution with minimal downtime, allowing you to enjoy fuller, healthier hair and regain confidence in your appearance.
